name: 49 Degrees North, WA
quote: Mostly natural snow. Limited need for artificial snowmaking.

name: Abenaki Ski Area, NH
image_credit: Image courtesy of Abenaki Ski Area
quote: Very inexpensive, safe, warm lodge, community feel.

name: Afton Alps, MN
quote: Lots of different runs. Multiple magic carpets. Affordable. Free parking that is next to the lifts.

name: Alpine Valley Resort, WI
quote: Extremely family-friendly and affordable. Provides enough terrain to get the basics down.

name: Alpine Valley, OH
quote: Shortest lift lines in Ohio.

name: Alta, UT
quote: Best snow in the USA. They have snow when others don't.

name: Alyeska, AK
quote: Best in Alaska. Deep powder, expert terrain and beautiful views.

name: Anthony Lakes, OR
quote: Anthony Lakes is small, friendly, family-oriented and personal.

name: Apple Mountain, MI
quote: Powder!

name: Arapahoe Basin, CO
quote: Best price, small crowds and great snow.

name: Bald Mountain, ID
quote: Inexpensive, good terrain, not overly populated.

name: Bear Valley, CA
quote: Compact layout allows you to let your children ski freely. Friendly staff and family oriented.

name: Beech Mountain Resort, NC
image_credit: Image courtesy of Beech Mountain Resort
quote: Great mountain for families with a variety of terrain to learn and grown on.

name: Belleayre, NY
quote: Beginner area is separated from the main mountain so beginners can have a safe, non-intimidating environment to learn.

name: Big Sky, MT
quote: Such diverse terrain.

name: Big Squaw Mountain, ME
image_credit: Image courtesy of Big Squaw Mountain
quote: Great skiing and no lift lines.

name: Black Mountain Ski Area, NH
image_credit: Image courtesy of Black Mountain Ski Area
quote: Small, uncrowded, good instructors.

name: Bolton Valley, VT
quote: Awesome family resort.

name: Boreal Mountain, CA
quote: Small mountain with terrain for EVERY skill level. There are bunny slopes and magic carpets, and then there's the progression parks and the Woodward training facility.

name: Bottineau Winter Park, ND
quote: Start small, you will go far! What they lack in vertical, they make up w/the hospitality.

name: Boyne Highlands, MI
quote: Good variety of terrain on fairly short runs and fast lifts.

name: Boyne Mountain, MI
quote: Most vertical in Michigan.

name: Brantling Ski Slopes, NY
quote: Great staff. Small groups. Appropriate terrain.

name: Bretton Woods, NH
quote: Amazing variety of terrain and phenomenal views of Mt. Washington.

name: Brighton, UT
quote: The terrain is conducive to learning and the staff of instructors is very patient and skilled.

name: Bromley Mountain, VT
quote: Good beginner deals, ski school, and rental equipment. All trails meet at same place so it's easy to find the other people you are with.

name: Bryce Resort, VA
quote: Both staff and terrain make this a great place to learn.

name: Buck Hill, MN
quote: Great beginner terain and ski school for adults and kids.

name: Burke Mountain, VT
quote: Learned here and taught my children. Excellent school programs.

name: Caberfae Peaks, MI
quote: The terrain is perfect for beginners and the lodge is picnic friendly.

name: Canaan Valley, WV
quote: Great long runs for all skill levels. Learning area is designated for beginners and staff is always willing to help.

name: Cannon Mountain, NH
quote: Olympic medalist Bode Miller trained there for most of his life. I've said enough.

name: Cascade Mountain, WI
quote: Beautiful. Great packages for beginners. Wonderful instructors. Top notch facilities and staff.

name: Cataloochee, NC
quote: It is our local hill with a fun bunch of instructors.

name: Chestnut Mountain, IL
quote: They have two great bunny hills that are perfect for beginners and intermediates. It's one of the best spots to practice.

name: Christmas Mountain, WI
quote: Beginner hill is very large and open with a tow rope.

name: Cranmore Mountain, NH
quote: The mountain has Terrain Based Learning, which has made teaching never-ever's so much easier and faster.

name: Crystal Mountain BC, CAN
quote: Good snow.

name: Crystal Mountain, MI
quote: Excellent instructors that really treat you like a family member. We love the ski lessons here and so do our kids!

name: Crystal Mountain, WA
quote: Even on powder days, the crowds are small and lift lines quick.

name: Deer Valley, UT
image_credit: Image courtesy of Deer Valley UT
quote: Excellent grooming on top of great snow. The world's best grooming team.

name: Devil's Head, WI
quote: Off the beaten path & never seems overly crowded.

name: Devils Elbow ON, CAN
quote: Good hill to learn on and reasonably priced.

name: Diamond Peak, NV
quote: Not crowded, excellent instructors, not expensive. There's even a model lift to learn how to get on and off a lift.

name: Discovery, MT
quote: No one there on weekdays, not too crowded on weekends. One of Montana's best kept secrets!

name: Dodge Ridge, CA
quote: Out of the way, great family area & no crowds.

name: Eagle Point, UT
quote: Mild slopes, few crowds and very friendly staff.

name: Echo Mountain, CO
image_credit: Image courtesy of Echo Mountain CO
quote: Very family friendly and small enough so kids can't get lost going off on their own.

name: Four Lakes, IL
quote: Most people there are beginners and will be at your same level.

name: Grand Targhee, WY
quote: 500+" of snow annually & champagne powder.

name: Granite Peak, WI
quote: More runs to choose from.

name: Homewood, CA
quote: Views for days and well priced!

name: Howelsen Hill Ski Area, CO
quote: No crowds, perfect terrain

name: Jackson Hole, WY
quote: Plenty of natural snowfall throughout the season.

name: Jay Peak, VT
quote: Best glades in the east.

name: June Mountain, CA
quote: Low crowd levels. FANTASTIC lifties. Geared towards families and kids.

name: Kicking Horse, BC
quote: So much open terrain, and never a big crowd.

name: Killington, VT
quote: Incredible snowmaking and grooming capability. Consistently first to open and last to close in New England.

name: King Pine, NH
quote: Gentle terrain and quality snow. Instructors are well trained and make learning a new sport enjoyable.

name: Kirkwood, CA
quote: Good vibes, great staff, never too crowded.

name: Kissing Bridge, NY
quote: Excellent center and staff. Open at night.

name: Little Switzerland, WI
quote: Being a Midwest resort can be a challenge with weather, yet Switzerland continues to strive and excel in maintaining its hill.

name: Loon Mountain, NH
quote: Awesome snowmaking system and management.

name: Lost Trail, MT
quote: Snowiest place around. Just rules.

name: Loup Loup Ski Bowl, WA
quote: Great hole-in-the-wall ski area.

name: Loveland Ski Area, CO
quote: Some of the easiest, widest, and longest greens I've seen. But also a great place to work up to some blacks and trees.

name: Lutsen Mountains, MN
quote: Good terrain and long, easy runs.

name: Mad River Glen, VT
image_credit: Image courtesy of Mad River Glen
quote: Ski it if you can.

name: Magic Mountain, VT
quote: Best kept secret in VT. This mountain has a great old school vibe and a great mountain community.

name: Mammoth Mountain, CA
quote: Great mix of terrain and large enough to find empty runs on crowded days.

name: Manning Park Resort BC, CAN
quote: Even on busier days, there are no crowds. The staff move people through the lines quickly and efficiently.

name: Maple Ski Ridge, NY
quote: Amazing lesson program with easy terrain.

name: Massanutten, VA
quote: The main green trail by the lodge is perfect to learn on.

name: McCauley Mountain Ski Area, NY
image_credit: Image courtesy of McCauley Mountain Ski Area

name: Mount Bohemia, MI
quote: Wicked awesome runs that are challenging and as fast as you can handle. It pushes you to excellence quick.

name: Mount Sunapee, NH
quote: It's obvious snow quality is management's top priority.

name: Mt Baker, WA
quote: Baker gets the goods.

name: Mt. Rose Ski Tahoe, NV
image_credit: Image courtesy of Mt. Rose Ski Tahoe
quote: Along with great snowmaking, it has the highest base elevation in the Sierras.

name: Nub's Nob, MI
quote: Evenly groomed, no bare spots. Best groomers ever.

name: Oak Mountain, NY
quote: Not well known by many.

name: Ober Gatlinburg, TN
quote: It's great for the fam!

name: Okemo Mountain, VT
quote: Consistently great snow and coverage.

name: Otis Ridge, MA
quote: Quiet, small family area.

name: Pajarito, NM
quote: Lesser known yet not far from Albuquerque.

name: Powder Mountain, UT
quote: Gorgeous and huge!

name: Powderhorn, CO
quote: This hidden gem on the western slope is short on the crowds and high speed on the lift.

name: Ragged Mountain, NH
quote: The Bebe Woods ski program allows you to learn for FREE!

name: Red Lodge Mountain, MT
quote: Perfect for someone that doesn't like crowds and loves a challenge!

name: Red Mountain Resort, BC
image_credit: Image courtesy of Red Mountain Resort
quote: Hardcore, challenging terrain.

name: Revelstoke Mountain Resort, BC
image_credit: Image courtesy of Revelstoke Mountain Resort
quote: The world doesn't know how amazing this place is.

name: Shanty Creek Resorts, MI
image_credit: Image courtesy of Shanty Creek Resorts
quote: Well-maintained and good snowmaking.

name: Silverton Mountain, CO
quote: Deep powder and steep terrain is around every corner.

name: Sir Sam's ON, CAN
quote: No crowds, friendly and safe.

name: Ski Cooper, CO
quote: Wide runs and great prices for someone just starting.

name: Ski Snowstar, IL
quote: Good for families.

name: Smugglers' Notch, VT
quote: With a variety of terrain and progression-based approach, Smuggs has a great beginner-friendly resort culture.

name: Snow Ridge, NY
quote: Inexpensive and terrain for all levels.

name: Snow Valley, CA
image_credit: Image courtesy of Snow Valley, CA
quote: The price is right for beginners. Majority of the runs are easy and wide open.

name: Snowbasin, UT
quote: The perfect mix of just about everything you could want.

name: Snowbird, UT
quote: Snowfall is unbelievable. Nothing can rival this mountain for consistent snowfall.

name: Snowshoe Mountain, WV
quote: A lot of different trails and a lot of open space!

name: Snowy Range, WY
quote: The quality and the integrity of the instructors are beyond compare.

name: Soldier Mountain, ID
quote: Totally empty always, which is great for me.

name: Solitude Mountain Resort, UT
image_credit: Image courtesy of Solitude Mountain Resort
quote: Great price for Utah and a very family-friendly place.

name: Squaw Valley, CA
image_credit: Image courtesy of Squaw Valley CA
quote: Just awesome!

name: Stony Mountain, MB
quote: Friendly staff. Good place to learn.

name: Stowe, VT
quote: Plentiful natural snow and world-class snowmaking.

name: Sugar Bowl, CA
quote: Tahoes deepest!

name: Sugar Mountain, NC
quote: It's usually not as crowded as other resorts.

name: Sugarbush, VT
quote: Multiple mountains. Caste rock is ledgendary. Crazy moguls.

name: Sugarloaf, ME
quote: The only above-treeline skiing in New England.

name: Sun Peaks Resort, BC
quote: Plenty of options for skiing and non-ski activities...all right there!

name: Sundance Resort, UT
quote: It has a lot of beginner areas, a great atmosphere for new people, and is very economic.

name: Sunday River, ME
quote: Phenomenal snowmaking and grooming.

name: Sunlight Mountain, CO
image_credit: Image courtesy of Sunlight Mountain CO
quote: It's low-key, beautiful, down to earth. Great terrain but you can't get lost. It all leads down to a very modest and friendly lodge.

name: Swain Resort, NY
quote: Even when Swain is busy, it isn't busy.

name: Tahoe Donner, CA
quote: Tahoe Donner offers a small, safe area where beginners can gain confidence quickly.

name: Tamarack Resort, ID
quote: It's pretty typical to find a powder hole where you can keep coming back to, and all the tracks are your own.

name: Taos Ski Valley, NM
quote: TAOS is a four letter word for steep!

name: The Omni Homestead Ski Resort, VA
image_credit: Image courtesy of The Omni Homestead Ski Resort
quote: It is never crowded and the beginner runs are good to learn on.

name: The Whitecap Mountains, WI
image_credit: Image courtesy of The Whitecap Mountains
quote: Most terrain options in the area.

name: Timber Ridge, MI
quote: It's not huge, but provides just what we like. Not too crowded and yet skiing is great!

name: Timberline Four Seasons Resort, WV
image_credit: Image courtesy of Timberline Four Seasons
quote: Remote. Less known. Good trails.

name: Titus Mountain, NY
quote: Titus is a great confidence builder! They keep safety first and have incredible snow conditions.

name: Treetops Resort, MI
quote: Perfect size to let the kids have freedom but still be able to keep track of everyone.

name: Tyrol Basin, WI
quote: Great pre-school ski school and magic carpet that leads to the top of a wide gentle slope.

name: Whistler Blackcomb, BC
quote: The resort is HUGE. Lots of options on where and what terrain to ride.

name: Whiteface - Lake Placid, NY
image_credit: Image courtesy of Whiteface - Lake Placid
quote: World-class skiing with the toughest conditions in the US.

name: Wildcat Mountain, NH
quote: Natural and wild, the way skiing is meant to be!

name: Wintergreen Resort, VA
image_credit: Image courtesy of Wintergreen Resort VA
quote: Good instructors, especially the kids programs. Nice variety and progression of terrain.

name: Winterplace, WV
quote: Lots of good, beginner terrain.

name: Wisp Resort, MD
quote: Small, family-friendly place. Fabulous in a snowstorm.

name: Wolf Creek, CO
quote: Great base early on and usually gets more than 400 inches.

name: Wolf Ridge, NC
quote: Small resort that's good for families.

name: Yosemite Ski & Snowboard Area, CA
quote: Easygoing, beautiful hill, affordable prices, great teachers.
